game.name: Aooni The Horror of Blueberry Onsen
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 통계, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Challenge yourself while being chased by fear! A horror puzzle action adventure! ■A completely new version of the legendary horror game "Ao Oni"!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Challenge yourself while being chased by fear! A horror puzzle action adventure! ■A completely new version of the legendary horror game "Ao Oni"!

reviewHighlights.text: 타케시 독극물 드링킹으로 자살하려는 걸 어떻게든 막겠다고 사물함을 의자로 가둔 내가 밉다
